net.jordaria

Class Jordaria

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.Jordaria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Listener

    public class Jordaria
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Listener
    The entry point of the program, containing subsystems and data.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

      • main

        The main method. Creates and starts a new game.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments for the program

      • getInstance

        public static Jordaria getInstance()
        Returns the current instance of Jordaria. There is only one at any time, and it is one of the first things created.
        Returns:
        a reference to the Jordaria program currently running

      • tryConsoleInit

        public void tryConsoleInit()
        Starts the console if debug mode is active.

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Sets up subsystems and prepares them for starting the game.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the game if it is not running, otherwise does nothing.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Clears references, garbage collects, and calls System.exit(0).

      • garbageCollect

        public void garbageCollect()
        Runs the system garbage collector. The same thing as calling System.gc();

      • run

        public void run()
        Fires Tick events while the game is running.
        Specified by:
